description:
One day Ritsu Onodera runs into the author Ryouichi Sumi who he had
worked with at his old company. Ritsu also gets introduced to Ryouichi Sumi`s
new editor and gets in contact with the literary world again after a 
long hiatus, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Never Rains but it Pours.
It Never Rains but it Pours.
It never rains but it pours.
